db:select.doc:name: Get By Date
db:select.db:dynamic-query:
SELECT * FROM orderdb.order WHERE 1=1 #[(message.inboundProperties.'http.query.params'.customerId != '' and message.inboundProperties.'http.query.params'.customerId != null) ? ' AND customer_id = '+message.inboundProperties.'http.query.params'.customerId:'']
#[(message.inboundProperties.'http.query.params'.date != '' and message.inboundProperties.'http.query.params'.date != null) ? ' AND DATE(date) = \''+message.inboundProperties.'http.query.params'.date+'\'':''] order by date ;

dw:transform-message.doc:name: Transform Message
dw:transform-message.dw:set-payload: %dw 1.0 %output application/json --- payload map ((payload01 , indexOfPayload01) -> { amount: payload01.amount as :number, customerId: payload01.customer_id, date: payload01.date as :string, number: payload01.id as :string })
